name: Endless Marathon
description:
Sit on the sofa, relax and play Endless Marathon! There is nothing difficult here, just run along the road and dodge obstacles. The game has musical accompaniment, which makes it more relaxed. At any time you can buy yourself a new character for in-game coins! Can you beat my record = 178362? If so, then you can consider yourself a pro at this game.

(This game is not plagiarized from games like Subway Surfers, Minion Rush, Temple Run, Temple Run 2, or any other runner game.)
